etymology.description: Depicts a tree with vertical growth not yet reaching full maturity.
etymology.interpretation: The character 未(mèi) represents a tree that has not yet reached its full height, symbolizing the concept of 'not yet' or 'not yet fulfilled'. This pictorial representation highlights the state of incompleteness or being unfinished.

examples.chinese: 我未看见他(我未看見他)，也未听到消息(也未聽到消息)。
examples.pinyin: Wǒ mèi kànjiàn tā, yě mèi tīngdào xiāoxī.
examples.english: I did not see him, nor did I hear any news.

examples.chinese: 他未明白问题(他未明白問題)。
examples.english: He did not understand the problem.
